Name: TRAVEL SPECIALIST
Company description: Book your stay to Tahiti ! Motivated by an intimate knowledge of and affection for French Polynesia (also called the islands of Tahiti), Discover Polynesia invites you to the ultimate travel experience, devoid of gimmicks and blissfully released from mass tourism. With its expertise of Travel Designer, exclusive deals and extensive travel experience, Discover Polynesia is able to design tailored itineraries to fulfill each travel dream. The advantages of delegating to a Travel Designer are multiple: Tahiti is a remote and vast destination that spans on a territory as vast as Europe (a total of 118 islands), so it is almost impossible to coordinate your trip by yourself, contrary to other destinations. Discover Polynesia imagine a realistic and relevant program regarding the profile of travellers (solo, couples, families).  Due to its complexities, the destination of Tahiti and its islands is an "intermediated" destination, in other words with many intermediaries (in the traditional distribution: you book through your preferred travel agency based in your living area > that buys your stay trough a specialized tour operator based in your country > that buys your stay to an inbound travel agency based in Tahiti...). Of course, each intermediary margins the production of your stay. Discover Polynesia allows to reduce the costs of your stay, by removing an intermediary, connecting you directly with the most relevant inbound travel agency.

Name: Travel Prime | The #web3 Travel Revolution
Company description: üá¨üáß Travel Prime is the first travel subscription platform. Each user saves as they wish and according to their budget by securing the funds via a ring-fencing account and #blockchain technology. Thanks to their subscription, they benefit from the lowest guaranteed discounts. This guarantee is made possible by the automatic application in face value of the commissions granted by the tour operators directly on the offers, or, (when this is not technically possible) by the sharing and redistribution to all subscribers of each commission received. This project in SaaS mode is intended to be as close as possible to the #web3 spirit while in accordance with the legislation in force. Each subscriber is an integral part of the project and will participate, through a voting system, in the expansion of Travel Prime and in the strategic decisions of the Start-up. The interoperable system is also positioned as a new payment system via user savings. It allows the dynamic display in superimposition of the remainder payable on partner offers. Travel Prime was announced for the first time at the big #MysterFly party at the #pavillonDauphine during the #iftm2022 event and the first press interview was signed #eventiz During this start, the first 5000 new ambassadors, by simply registering on a waiting list will have the privilege of accessing a pre-sale subscription to obtain several advantages, as the first promoters of the project, in particular: free lifetime subscription and a special status. The pre-sale will take place according to the codes of #web3, namely through the sale of an NFT collection. The date is not yet announced. Hurry, places are limited!

In order not to succumb to the devastating spread of mass tourism, we have decided to offer you an up-to-date selection of the best lodges, ecolodges, bungalows, cabins, gites, carbets, fares, charming hotels and straw huts in the world, accommodation that respects nature and its inhabitants, away from the crowds. Admittedly, our selection of accommodation is sometimes positioned in the middle-upper end of the market and can be more expensive, but it is preferable to enhance the appreciation of a trip by individualizing it rather than to distort local life through a massive infiltration of tourists; some destinations are revising their "tourism" policy in order to preserve their culture and environment, and also realize the negative impact of flat rental platforms when no limits are set. Not so long ago, in the value chain of a trip, air transport was the most expensive; today, this is often no longer the case with the arrival of low-cost airlines. Some low fare airlines are standardizing to long-haul destinations, and deeply traditional airlines are tending to reduce their costs by changing their business model on short- and medium-haul flights. It is already possible to travel in low cost - low fare within 5 to 6 hours from home, and therefore to invest more in the land part of the journey. Thus, the organisation of land-based travel becomes the key element of the trip, particularly with the emergence and know-how of local experts ( local tour operators and guides). With our partners, we continue to supply the world's most beautiful lodges, and ecolodges of the Planet and we thank you warmly for your many expressions of support.  Special thanks to our 200,000 unique visitors during this difficult period which affects us all. Jean Michel Bohn

He then began a career in purchasing, working for large companies in Toulouse and then Belgium. But the pull from his roots proved too strong‚Ä¶ and he decided in March 2016 to come back to the region and follow his heart by setting up B-Holidays. His grandfather, Raul Busquets, a Catalan who was passionate about the Eastern Pyrenees, never tired of regaling him with tales of the region‚Äôs riches. He also felt the region was little known and under-exploited, considering its wealth of attractions. This was why Thomas set up B-Holidays: to promote discovery of the local area and everything it has to offer, basing our offering on the concept of quality - and an exchange between visitors and locals. To paraphrase the famous Roussillon singer, Jordi Barre, ¬´I want to sweep away the frontiers that defend the treasures of these horizons, through the love in my heart¬ª. This is the true spirit of B-Holidays. We‚Äôll help you discover the Eastern Pyrenees region. But we want you to get involved and be an actor - rather than a spectator - in your holiday experience. Therefore, B-Holidays met wine producers, farmers, local cultural associations, artisans, shop owners, artists‚Ä¶ to create original activities that get you involved whilst discovering another facet of the Eastern Pyrenees.

The Syndicate of French Tour-Operators (SETO) was founded on March 5, 2013 by the members of the CETO (Association of Tour-Operators). The outcome will be a stronger representation of tour-operators, which will play a key role in defending the interest of the profession in future challenges, such as market transformation, and other technological, legal, consumerist and social issues. With this in mind, the SETO will endeavor to encourage further membership of travel producers at large, based on their capacity to contribute to joint projects (new technologies, new markets, etc.). The SETO will work towards building a travel trade Federation. Ren√©-Marc CHIKLI is President of the SETO. The Syndicate expresses its point of view on topical issues on a regular basis.

Initiated by Laurentian University president John S. Daniel who had studied in Oxford and Paris, and Sam Blyth of Blyth and Company of Toronto, a student travel agency, the program was coordinated by Douglas Parker, professor of English and former Dean of Humanities, from 1987 until 1992, and then by K. Walter Schwager, Professor of Sociology and former Dean of Social Sciences, from 1992 until 1996. Mostly including second year courses in Humanities (literature, music, history, classical studies) and language courses, the program was to equip future leaders in different areas of Canadian life with bilingual skills. Students at Ontario universities could transfer credits. They paid the same tuition fees as students at Laurentian University in Sudbury. The program stopped in 1996 for financial reasons.

Name: Bespoke Paris
Company description: Bespoke Paris is a boutique travel experience design company located in the French capital that blends our passion for travel with our love for this amazing country. We work closely with our clients to develop exciting, culturally enriching travel plans that allow you to comfortably experience all that France has to offer. Bespoke Paris was founded to provide insightful, authentic travel itineraries for those looking to enjoy Paris and other parts of France. As travelers who have lived in Paris and traveled extensively to all corners of the nation, we will help design a travel plan based on our experiences.  By offering an intensive consultation that helps us understand what you prefer to see and do during your travels, we are able to fully customize your travel plan.  As a boutique agency, we take the time to get to know our clients. Unlike other travel agencies which simply see you as a way to make money, we genuinely care about crafting the perfect travel experience for every person that steps foot in France. Say goodbye to simply visiting the typical tourist locations and let us introduce your to a side of Paris that only the locals have truly enjoyed! Each one of our travel plans is completely unique to the traveler, allowing them to indulge in the elements of Paris that will captivate them every step of way. As Bespoke Paris is at the intersection of love for the beauty of France, passion for authentic travel and a desire to help YOU create meaningful memories that last a lifetime, we are the authority on all things travel within France. We have developed an expert travel curation system that uses 16 unique categories, allowing us to generate an itinerary specific to your aspirations. All of our advice is offered with your best interest in mind, as we have no allegiance to particular travel companies, hotels or third party businesses.
